channel.title: [Delta] NPC Talk
channel.description: How do you make a npc talk in delta, like u know.. talk like a player does cause i can't figure it out i tried adding a code from other 317 server that isn't delta and when i compiled and started server again the NPC wasn't talking. Does anyone know how to make it talk?

item.title: [Delta] NPC Talk
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

So i should make 1?

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] NPC Talk
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

your errors mean that there is no such method called: npcs.textUpdateRequired = true;

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] NPC Talk
item.dc:creator: @kriskuhar kriskuhar
item.description:
@kriskuhar wrote:

When it says Variable not found or what not it means that there a part of the command that it cannot find in the client.java, and the npchandler.java; so you need to add it…

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] NPC Talk
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

NPCHandler.java:2690: cannot find symbol symbol : variable npcType location: class NPC[] if (npcs.npcType == 170) { ^ NPCHandler.java:2692: cannot find symbol symbol : variable updateRequired location: class NPC[] npcs.updateRequired = true; ^ NPCHandler.java:2693: cannot find symbol symbol : variable textUpdateRequired location: class NPC[] npcs.textUpdateRequired = true; ^ NPCHandler.java:2694: cannot find symbol symbol : variable textUpdate location: class NPC[] npcs.textUpdate = "Your message here if this work mayb some REP?"; ^ 4 errors Press any key to continue . . .
First i was getting more errors cause it was with 1 bracket
I added another one now i get only 4 errors
If i add a 3rd one i get more.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] NPC Talk
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

Still no talking

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] NPC Talk

item.description:
@Rickpwns wrote:

Make sure that it’s ‘true’.

Read full topic
